GSD.description:
mm/mempolicy: fix uninit-value in mpol_rebind_policy()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.290 by commit aaa1c5d635a6fca2043513ffb5be169f9cd17d9e. For more details please see the references link.
